participant_1.background:
Losing my father was the hardest thing I've ever been through.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
my favorite band is nickelback.
i am an old woman who lives on a social security check.
i love horses.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
My wedding planning business took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.
i secretly love watching we wrestling.
I love my mom's home cooked meals.
i spend most of my days working at my churchs food pantry.

content.text: I am doing great, thank you for asking! How are you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am sorry to hear about your father. I lost my father a few years ago and it was the hardest thing I have ever been through.
Thank you for your kind words. It was definitely hard, but I am grateful for the time I had with him.
I am sure you are. I am glad to hear that you have a close-knit family. I love spending time with my family, especially on sunny days.
That is wonderful! My family is very important to me. We love to go on camping trips and spend time outdoors together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go camping too. My favorite band is Nickelback. Do you like them?
I have never really listened to them before. I will have to give them a listen! I love to cook and my mom's home cooked meals are the best!
I love cooking too! My family always loved when I would cook dinner for them. What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I also love to bake.
Pasta is my favorite! I love all kinds of pasta dishes. Baking is fun too. I love making cookies and pies.
Cookies are my favorite! I love baking them with my kids. I am so glad we got to chat today!
Me too! It was nice talking to you. Have a great day!
